title: Todd Monken: Jim Schwartz is an outstanding DC, but it's inappropriate to comment on status

sources.name: Pro Football Talk
sources.title: Todd Monken: Jim Schwartz is an outstanding DC, but it's inappropriate to comment on status
sources.description: The Browns want to keep Jim Schwartz as their defensive coordinator, which team owner Jimmy Haslam has made clear since firing former head coach Kevin Stefanski last month.
